website_summaries.verdict: The RHA T20 is a rather pricey pair of earphones, but it delivers an accurate sound that caters to audiophiles.
pros: Excellent audio performance with accurate bass response and wonderful clarity in the highs
Ships with several accessories, including multiple eartips and three tuning filters to adjust treble and bass
cons: A detachable cable would be nice in this price range

customer_reviews.title: Must be tops for £200 earphones
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be a very well made set of earphones. Great fit once you've played with the various plugs. I don't know what it is but sometimes they sound bass light and other times the bass seems a bit overpowering. Is there a certain frequency where they fall down? I'll run them overnight as one reviewer said there's a point where it all falls into place after a good run in. I've reverted to my Philips Fidelio SB2K's at the moment as these must be the best sub £100 earphones around. An add-on. As stated by the other reviewer they need a good bed in to come into their own. Certainly worth the wait though.
customer_reviews.author: M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Impressive sound, great quality and easy to hold on the ear. I have bought a few earbuds before this including the RHA T10i and I returned them all, I will keep this one after I tried all the others. It is worth every penny and it is durable too. The sound is revolutionary and much much better than the previous version T10i, and it is easier to hold on the ear and lighter for they replaced the metal cable with a light rubber cable.
customer_reviews.author: Anat Media Ltd

customer_reviews.title: Buy Buy Buy but with conditions.
customer_reviews.text: But only after I bought a decent MP3 player. In this case an iTouch (after lots of research). My Sony mp3 pplayer didn't have the guts to run the phones properly. So, don't buy unless you have a Cowon or Astell & Kern or iTouch 128gb or are prepared to by something similar on top of these phones.
customer_reviews.author: Mr A.W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: The sound is beautiful and incredible
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my music on the go. The sound is beautiful and incredible. They make songs sound wider. Very luxurious item, I know, but if you want to buy something that you know will be good quality, these are the ones. Thankyou RHA! :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to see if over the over-ear design suits me before investing in expensive custom in-ears (Noble), and like them so much that I'm not even interested in the Noble any longer. Excellent sub base, clarity & wide soundstage. With the Comply's they are very secure and comfortable, I sometimes forget I have them in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Riaan Jutte

customer_reviews.title: Sound brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I was worried they would be heavy and uncomfortable but they have surprised me . The sound quality is great . Exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me - so glad RHA fixed the way ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me - so glad RHA fixed the way that they fit around the ears. Sound quality excellent for my classical and jazz - in fact all styles. For the money these are very good indeed and I have tried many high reputation brands in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Jinty

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding !
customer_reviews.text: The T20's, in my opinion, sound better than my Sure SE425's. Even straight out of the box, compared to my run in Sure's. I chose these because of the reported abundance of bass and I am not disappointed. I usually run my headphones through an FiiO E12A amp but even plugging straight in to my phone they sound great! Beautifully well constructed, you can literally feel the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing, having the filters means you can customize your sound I use an EQ on my phone to make the sound quality even better They are made of stainless steel so they will not break anytime soon The noise cancelling is ok, I use foam tips to maximize the noise cancelling
customer_reviews.author: Jack Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my partner who listens to music through headphones a lot. He really rates these, especially as they have replaceable filters.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: This is a very impressive product which easily lives up to the statements made in the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought on the basis of press reviews and the specifications on the website. This is a very impressive product which easily lives up to the statements made in the reviews. Excellent sound and definition with superb build quality. Well designed and has also covered the main weakness of over ear headphones being the cable and connectors which are prone to break or crack.
customer_reviews.author: Hamish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality headphones and a few headphone accessories too
customer_reviews.author: Mr Paul Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality pairs with pretty balanced sound
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality pairs with pretty balanced sound. In addition, amazing customer service when they replaced my faulty unit after 1 year of use with a brand new one, the process is easy & fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Duy T Vu

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING EARPHONES
customer_reviews.text: I have many various types of headphones and earphones , but for the price paid these are outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Andy L

customer_reviews.title: Good value, high quality. Aimed at pop/rock.
customer_reviews.text: Interesting IEM. For general music it's great - rock/metal/country - all fine. If classical is your bag, then probably best to avoid as they are too bass heavy, irrespective of which filter is fitted. Note that because the casing is metal, they can be cold when first inserted into the ear, but quickly warm up.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. B. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Sent back as impractical
customer_reviews.text: Sent back for a refund, yes they are good quality but not particularly comfortable, they are also very impractical as its too time consuming to fit them in your ears. The cable is also ridiculously long, heavy and thick.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: excellent bass, puts Beats headphones to shame
customer_reviews.text: Superb sound quality, excellent bass, puts Beats headphones to shame. Top notch build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gympro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones crystal clear sound and they don't fall out of my ears
customer_reviews.author: unca bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These hadphones are a winner. The sound makes me want to cry
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: A Best buy
customer_reviews.text: Took a few moments to select the right ear bud. But once done the sound is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god. I have to say this is the great purchase I made on Amazon since becoming a member in 2007! I've tried so many. I loved the sound of over ear headphones but never liked the practicality of it in the summer and the gym. Plus I'm tiny! This gives you everything if not more with sound quality, noise cancelling, options to customise your earphones and my favourite, no sound leakage! I have the base filters in and they sound superb. They are comfortable for all day wear. I would recommend buying and trying. You won't be disappointed! If you are, just return them. Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ailia

customer_reviews.title: Pile of rubbish DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: For anyone looking to buy these they do sound great but the structure of them is awful I bought a pair and within not even a month and a half the left earbug is broke it isn't as loud as the right and yes I have been taking care of them so I'd not be recommending them to anyone as they don't last long as other headphones and you only have a day to return them which is appalling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Writing review after3 months of using Positives - Good sound, - Good packaging. Negatives - Long and heavy cable, bit tedious to deal with most times. - Lots of wrinkles in ear hooks
customer_reviews.author: lockworm

customer_reviews.title: The cable quality so bad and after 1 months of light usage they stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: The cable quality so bad and after 1 months of light usage they stopped working in one ear.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

product_meta.title: RHA T20 High Fidelity Noise Isolating Dual Coil In-Ear Headphone
product_meta.description: Size Name:T20 (Disc. by Manufacturer)The T20 is a high performance in-ear headphone featuring revolutionary Dual Coil dynamic driver technology capable of outperforming conventional drivers in levels of resolution, clarity and detail. The injection moulded stainless steel housings feature a tuning filter system to adjust the sound signature, while a comfortable, noise isolating fit is ensured by patent pending, mouldable over-ear hooks.
feature_bullets: Revolutionary Dual Coil dynamic driver engineered to deliver refined, high resolution audio with a neutral tonal balance.
3 Year Warranty. Frequency Range- 16 – 40,000Hz, Rated/Max Power- 2 / 5mW, Cable- 1.35 meter OFC, Weight- 41 grams
Metal injection moulded, stainless steel construction

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
